member.name: T:Sudoku.UI.ResourceDictionaries.TextResources
member.summary: Provides a way to get the local text resources, and save the resources to the local path.

member.name: F:Sudoku.UI.ResourceDictionaries.TextResources.Current
member.summary: Indicates the singleton to get items and method invokes.

remarks.para:
This is a instance, which means you can get anything you want using the following code style to get the items in this class:
Current.PropertyName (Property invokes)
Current[PropertyIndex] (Indexer invokes)
For example, if you want to get the value from the key "Bug", now you may write Current.Bug or Current["Bug"] to get that value.

member.name: M:Sudoku.UI.ResourceDictionaries.TextResources.TryGetValue(System.String)
member.summary: Try to get the inner value.
member.param: The index that you want to get. The index is a key.
